name: Duo Maze
description:
Swipe up, down, left and right to move two balls in opposite directions inside a challenging and puzzling maze.
Complete the levels of each puzzle by solving the challenging maze and colliding the two balls.

Duo Maze! is the 2019 free game you'll want to tell your friends about.
Which level can you reach?!

FEATURES
- Unique and fun puzzles levels
- Simple and satisfying
- Smooth and satisfying
- Free to play
- Colourful
- Fun and relaxing to play
